summary: This bill, the VA Loan Informed Disclosure Act of 2025, aims to improve consumer awareness regarding VA home loans. It amends the National Housing Act to include information about VA loans in the informed consumer choice disclosure provided to prospective FHA borrowers. Additionally, it mandates a military service question on the Uniform Residential Loan Application, promoting a better assessment of loan options for veterans. The bill also includes rulemaking instructions for the Director of the Federal Housing Finance Agency.
